headline: UN Global Compact Network USA Welcomes New Board Members from ADM and NVIDIA
summary: The UN Global Compact Network USA (Network USA) welcomes two new members to its Board of Directors: Katherine Pickus, Chief Sustainability Officer of ADM, and Josh Parker, Head of Sustainability at NVIDIA. In addition, the Board of Directors has elected Shobha Meera, Chief Corporate Responsibility Officer at Capgemini, as Board Treasurer. She succeeds former Board Member Michael Okoroafor of McCormick & Company, who recently retired.

headline: McCormick removed from ‘US 1 List’ at BofA
summary: BofA analysts are removing McCormick (MKC) from the firm’s “US 1 List,” a collection of the best investment ideas that are drawn from the universe of Buy-rated, U.S.-listed stocks covered by BofA Global Research fundamental equity research analysts. The firm is also renewing RenaissanceRe (RNR), Northrop Grumman (NOC), and RTX (RTX) for new terms following 52 weeks on the list.
